Issue.summary: Invoke command sometimes take too much time.
Issue.description: https://hastebin.com/eberafirac.bash *Peers Logs* ===> https://hastebin.com/gowajocutu.md *Chaincode Function that was executed* ===> https://hastebin.com/hihusepoqa.sql Postman Screenshot !hyp.png|thumbnail! I tried to use invoke command using peer chaincode invoke and it responded within 1 second. *Peer Invoke Logs* ==> https://hastebin.com/evajikijor.pl We are using Fabric v1.1 The Fabric SDK code can be found here : https://github.com/debutdeveloper/fabric_sdk_api >
